description: Trek it out to bear country (or anywhere, really) in our Bear Country Graphic Long Sleeve Tee, featuring an original design by Brittany Lewis for Smartwool. The benefits of Merino wool are blended with the durability of polyester for a long sleeve that’s always on top of odor, moisture, and temperature regulation, so it’s always adventure-ready. Plus, it has offset shoulder and side seams that help reduce chafing, as well as a perfectly relaxed fit that moves with you.
name: Smartwool Bear Country Graphic LS Tee - Unisex
